channel.title: Blogs on Dulguun Gantumur
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Dulguun Gantumur

item.title: Postmodernity and Ideological Thinking
item.description: The postmodern world has made us lonely and more susceptible to ideological thinking. Furthermore, ideological thinking and its effects are unnoticed as a result of ideologies becoming invisible to itself.

item.title: Critique of Asian Identity in the US
item.description: Asia is a Western notion. Etymologically it is theorized to have come from a Hittite word meaning “Northwest Anatolia” which was eventually borrowed into Greek from where it spread throughout Europe.
